thread.title: BRIEF-Totally says Margolis resigned as chief operating officer
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Totally says Margolis resigned as chief operating officer

title: BRIEF-Totally says Margolis resigned as chief operating officer
text:
BRIEF-Totally says Margolis resigned as chief operating officer Sept 28 
Sept 28 Totally Plc : 
* Announces that Andrew Margolis has resigned from his position as company's chief operating officer with immediate effect Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +91 806 749 1136) Trending On Reuters
